37.name: Blinding Burst I
37.Description: Blinds the nearby enemies within a 15m radius of you for 15s~25s.

25.name: Ambush I
25.Description: Jumps behind a target's back within 20m to inflict 94~98 physical damage. May also stun it.

31.Description: Jumps behind a target's back within 20m to inflict 104~108 physical damage. May also stun it.

50.name: Agony Rune I
50.Description: Inflicts 992 fire damage to a target within a 10m radius. Chain Skill Level 2

53.name: Agony Rune II
53.Description: Inflicts 1091 fire damage to a target within a 10m radius. Chain Skill Level 2

45.name: Apply Lethal Venom I
45.Description: Uses 5 Scolopen Poison to apply poison to your weapon. For 30s, there is a 2% chance of inflicting additional 464 damage to the target with each attack.

48.name: Apply Lethal Venom II
48.Description: Uses 6 Scolopen Poison apply poison to your weapon. For 30s, there is a 2% chance of inflicting additional 490 damage on the target with each attack.

51.name: Apply Lethal Venom III
51.Description: Uses 7 Scolopen Poison to apply poison to your weapon. For 30s, there is a 2% chance of inflicting additional 546 damage on the target with each attack.

54.name: Apply Lethal Venom IV
54.Description: Uses 8 Scolopen Poison to apply poison to your weapon. For 30s, there is a 2% chance of inflicting additional 605 damage on the target with each attack.

45.name: Lightning Slash I
45.Description: Inflicts 325~329 damage to the target. The target's Magic Accuracy decreases by 200 for 30s. Chain Skill Level 2

48.name: Lightning Slash II
48.Description: Inflicts 342~346 damage to the target. The target's Magic Accuracy decreases by 200 for 30s. Chain Skill Level 2

31.name: Oath of Accuracy I
31.Description: Increases your Accuracy by 500 and Magic Accuracy by 500 for 20s.

44.name: Throw Shuriken I
44.Description: Deals 582~586 physical damage to a target immobilized in mid-air within 20m.

50.name: Throw Shuriken II
50.Description: Deals 674~678 physical damage to a target immobilized in mid-air within 20m.

20.name: Flurry I
20.Description: Your Atk Speed increases by 20% for 30s.

52.name: Sensory Boost I
52.Description: Increases your Evasion by 800, and Magic Resistance by 500 for 12s.

40.name: Flash of Speed I
40.Description: You move 10m forward instantly, and all immobilization and Movement Speed reduction debuffs are removed.

28.name: Rune Burst I
28.Description: Erases the rune carved on a target within a 10m radius up to the level of 5 and sets it to burst, damaging the target. The amount of damage varies on the target's rune level.

34.name: Rune Burst II
34.Description: Erases the rune carved on a target within a 10m radius up to the level of 5 and sets it to burst, damaging the target. The amount of damage varies on the target's rune level.

40.Description: Erases the rune carved on a target within a 10m radius up to the level of 5 and sets it to burst, damaging the target. The amount of damage varies on the target's rune level.

46.Description: Erases the rune carved on a target within a 10m radius up to the level of 5 and sets it to burst, damaging the target. The amount of damage varies on the target's rune level.

52.name: Rune Burst V
52.Description: Erases the rune carved on a target within a 10m radius up to the level of 5 and sets it to burst, damaging the target. The amount of damage varies on the target's rune level.

34.name: Rune Knife I
34.Description: Deals 48~53 physical damage to a target within 11m, and carves runes up to level 3.

40.name: Rune Knife II
40.Description: Deals 55~60 physical damage to a target within 11m, and carves runes up to level 3.

46.name: Rune Knife III
46.Description: Deals 60~65 physical damage to a target within 11m, and carves runes up to level 3.

52.name: Rune Knife IV
52.Description: Deals 71~76 physical damage to a target within 11m, and carves runes up to level 3.

55.name: Signet Silence I
55.Description: Ignite a rune carved on a target within a 10m radius up to level 5, causing the rune to explode inflicting damage and silencing the target for 30s. The chance of silencing the target varies depending on the level of the rune carved on the target.

48.name: Deadly Abandon I
48.Description: Increases your Physical Attack by 20% for 3m while decreasing your Evasion by 200.

45.name: Ancestral Darkness Rune I
45.Description: Detonates up to 5 runes on a target within 20m, inflicting damage to the target and healing you for a portion of the damage.

50.name: Rune Swipe I
50.Description: Detonates a rune carved on a target within a 20m radius up to Level 5, causing the rune to explode, inflicting damage, Silence, and reducing the target’s Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

45.name: Ancestral Radiant Rune I
45.Description: A Stigma skill of ancient Daevas. Detonates up to 5 runes on a target within 20m, dealing damage, and also temporarily silences the target and reduces its Attack Speed.

45.name: Shadow Walk I
45.Description:
You enter Advanced Stealth for 5m. Your Movement Speed decreases by 20% while in effect.
You may use buff magic and skills on yourself three times and still remain in stealth.
Can't be used during battle.

50.name: Divine Rune I
50.Description: Detonates a rune carved on a target within a 20m radius up to Level 5, causing the rune to explode, inflicting damage, Silence, and reducing the target’s Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

52.name: Explosive Burst I
52.Description: Inflicts 869 Magical Fire Damage on a target within a 11 m radius of you, and also stuns the target.

55.name: Explosive Burst II
55.Description: Inflicts 942 Magical Fire Damage on a target within a 11 m radius of you, and also stuns the target.

28.name: Apply Deadly Poison I
28.Description: Uses 2 Scolopen Poison to apply poison to your weapon. For 2m, there is a 0.2% chance of stunning the enemy.

54.name: Venomous Strike I
54.Description: Chance to inflict 115~119 damage and poison the target for 15s. If used on the target's back, inflicts an additional 702 damage.

37.name: Eye of Wrath I
37.Description: Performs critical hit attacks up to 1 times for 10s. However, your Crit Strike decreases by 300.

22.name: Aethertwisting I
22.Description: You can resist 2 magical attacks. Lasts 8s.
